artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Mill: Bolan Fabrics; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Natural, white, beige warp. Natural, white & metallic copper weft. Plain weave variation. Left selvedge. Stapled to 8.5x11" card. "H-7" written on card.
